review: The Fire TV Stick was very easy to install and set up and sync with my Fire tablet. Streaming Amazon Prime episodes to the TV worked very well. The remote is very small, and the viewing buttons take some getting used to. Also the home screen display and looking for available content is somewhat tedious having to click a button for every move. Maybe Amazon will come up with a better way to navigate the screens. Can't beat the functionality provided at this price though. I'm very pleased with my purchase.
